who-is-rep.label: A legal representative
who-is-rep.hint: This includes legal representatives of main applicants, document holders and sponsors

sponsor.label: A sponsor
sponsor.hint: Sponsor means that the application is based on the main applicant’s relationship with you

guardian.label: A dependant or guardian of a dependant

who-is-representing.hint: You must have sent a signed letter of authority to the Home Office to act on this person’s behalf

sponsor-type.legend: What type of sponsor are you?
sponsor-type.hint: Sponsor means that the application is based on the main applicant’s relationship with you

settled-sponsor.label: A settled sponsor
settled-sponsor.hint: You have settlement (also called indefinite leave to remain)

eea-sponsor.label: An EEA citizen sponsor
eea-sponsor.hint: You are a citizen of an EU country, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland or Lichtenstein

dependant-or-guardian.legend: Are you a dependant or a guardian of a dependant?

dependant-over-18.label: A dependant aged 18 or over
dependant-over-18.hint: You are an adult named as a dependant on the application

parent-guardian-under-18.label: A parent or guardian of a dependant who is under 18
parent-guardian-under-18.hint: You are acting on behalf of a child named as a dependant on the application

confirm-sent-letter-of-authority.label: I confirm I have sent the Home Office a signed letter of authority

legal-rep-name.label: Name of legal firm or representative

is-passport-return-address.label: Should the documents be returned to this address

is-requesting-passport-to-travel.legend: Are you requesting the return of the main applicant's passport for travel?

british-citizen.label: British citizenship
british-citizen.hint: Includes status letters, right of abode, confirmation of non-acquisition, the Windrush Scheme and applications to give up citizenship

further-leave.label: Further leave to remain
further-leave.hint: Includes FLR (M), FLR (FP), FLR (O), and FLR (HRO) applications

not-time-limit.label: No time limit or replacement settlement biometric residence permit

eu-settlement-scheme.label: Settled or pre-settled status under the EU Settlement Scheme

settlement.label: Settlement
settlement.hint: Also called ‘indefinite leave to remain’ or ‘indefinite permission to stay’

limited-leave-replacement-brp.label: Transfer of conditions or limited leave replacement biometric residence permit

visa-type.legend: What type of visa is the application for?

visa-type-talent.label: Exceptional talent visa
visa-type-talent.hint: Also called tier 1 in the points-based system

visa-type-skilled.label: Skilled worker visa
visa-type-skilled.hint: Also called tier 2 in the points-based system

visa-type-study.label: Study visa
visa-type-study.hint: Also called tier 4 in the points-based system

visa-type-temp.label: Temporary work visa
visa-type-temp.hint: Also called tier 5 in the points-based system

visa-type-turkish.label: Turkish national visa
visa-type-turkish.hint: Includes Turkish businessperson and Turkish worker visas

date-of-application.legend: Date the main applicant submitted the application
date-of-application.hint: If you do not know the exact date, enter an approximate one

cancel-application.legend: Do you want to cancel the application?
cancel-application.hint: Any documents that were sent with the application will be returned

about-application.label: Date the main applicant submitted the application
about-application.hint: If you do not know the exact date, enter an approximate one

further-leave-to-remain.legend: Which type of further leave did you apply for?

main-applicant-full-name.label: Full name
main-applicant-full-name.hint: Enter the main applicant’s name exactly as it appears on their immigration document

main-applicant-dob.hint: Enter the date of birth as it appears in the main applicant’s immigration documents, for example 24 7 2000

main-applicant-nationality.label: Country of nationality
main-applicant-nationality.hint: This must match the main applicant’s immigration documents

document-type.legend: Which documents do you need back? (Optional)
document-type.hint: Select all the document types you need returned

document-description.label: Describe each of your documents (optional)
document-description.hint: Include the document type, as well as the owner’s name, nationality and date of birth. For example, passport, John Smith, British, 01/01/2009

contact-email.label: Email address
contact-email.hint: This is where we will send confirmation of your cancellation or request to return documents

contact-telephone.label: Telephone number
contact-telephone.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

notes.label: Enter any relevant details about your request, for example if you need your documents urgently

declaration-check.label: I understand and agree to this declaration
